find_top_properties.content: I want to find suitable properties with these criteria: areas = $AREAS, property type = $PROPERTY_TYPE, maximum budget = AED $MAX_BUDGET, minimum bedrooms = $MIN_BEDROOMS, minimum rental yield = $MIN_YIELD%. Please find and rank the top 5 properties.

market_summary.content: Summarize market from file $SUMMARY_FILE and list top 5 areas by volume and yield.

generate_report.content: Generate investor report: areas $AREAS, budget <= $MAX_BUDGET, min yield $MIN_YIELD%. Include top picks, risks, 5-year projection.
